| History                 = The Conclave of Seven Planets was a cabal which sentenced [[Molyb (Earth-616)|Metal Master]] to spend the rest of his life incarcerated in a secret deep-space torture prison.{{r|Black Bolt Vol 1 2}} After escaping from said prison on a ship, [[Blackagar Boltagon (Earth-616)|Black Bolt]] accidentally trespassed the Conclave's jurisdiction and was confronted by ships commanded by them. Black Bolt saw himself forced to fire at the enemy ships to avoid being killed himself.{{r|Black Bolt Vol 1 7}}
